summary: A coming-of-age story about two inner city boys who are left to fend for themselves over the summer after their mothers are taken away by the authorities.
cast: Skylan Brooks|Ethan Dizon|Jennifer Hudson|Adewale Akinnuoye-Agbaje|Jordin Sparks Thomas|Julito McCullum|Anthony Mackie|Jeffrey Wright|Kenneth Maharaj|Nikkieli DeMone|Joseph Adams|Kate Buddeke|Joey Auzenne|Adriane Lenox|Kate Geller|Michael Chmiel|Marcus Carl Franklin|Tarik Lowe|Rob Morgan|Massiel Mordan|Patrick Wetzel|Chandler Frantz|Lana Giacose|Eric Ruffin|Rege Lewis|Martha Millan|Eddie R. Brown III|Adam Trese|Jimmy Hays|Elijah Boothe|Brett Barsky|Roger Brenner|José Báez|Dj Nino Carta|Jordan Fargo|Kennedy Moronta|Amelia Scaramucci
title: The Inevitable Defeat of Mister & Pete
